page.title: 15A Day In The Life of Alan.
page.content: Alan Burgess,aged 11 years. In the morning I wake up at about 7.00am,I get dressed,have a wash and brush my teeth with Colgate blue minty gel toothpaste.My favourite items of clothing are my grey trousers,white sweatshirt and white Nicks trainers. For breakfast I usually have Kelloggs cornflakes or bacon sandwiches (butties).I get to school by a bus organized by some of the parents. During lunch time I am a server, which means I am responsible for setting the table for dinner and giving the dinner out.I play football and do high jump at dinner times.At about 3.35pm we line up and get on the bus to go home. For tea we have sandwiches and a yogurt.At night I either play with my games or watch television.Bedtime is 9.00pm.
